players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Bob's death is tragic. We need to share information carefully. Alice, why did you remain silent?"
Charlie: "Alice is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Charlie: "I urge Diana to vote for Alice. My investigation confirms she is mafia. We must act now."
